azurerm_iothub_dps_certificate.description: Manages an IoT Device Provisioning Service Certificate.

name.description: Specifies the name of the Iot Device Provisioning Service Certificate resource. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group under which the Iot Device Provisioning Service Certificate resource has to be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

iot_dps_name.description: The name of the IoT Device Provisioning Service that this certificate will be attached to. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

certificate_content.description: The Base-64 representation of the X509 leaf certificate .cer file or just a .pem file content.

id.description: The ID of the IoTHub Device Provisioning Service Certificate.

create.description: Used when creating the IotHub Device Provisioning Service Certificate.

update.description: Used when updating the IotHub Device Provisioning Service Certificate.

read.description: Used when retrieving the IotHub Device Provisioning Service Certificate.

delete.description: Used when deleting the IotHub Device Provisioning Service Certificate.
